description:
The world is on the verge of chaos. Hordes of zombies wreak havoc in cities, destroying everything in their path and devouring residents.

Armed with a pistol, enter into a merciless fight: the survival of the human race depends on your courage.

As you complete stages, earn money and buy more powerful weapons.
name: Zombie Night Defense
intro: Zombie Night Defense is an action tower defense game.
